ygData.subject: Speaking of +charisma items
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone gotten a Leatherfoot Raiders Cap, I read on eq lizer that it gives +10 charisma. Does it start in Rivervale with the Marshal who is the head of the
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone gotten a Leatherfoot Raiders Cap,
I read on eq'lizer that it gives +10 charisma.

Does it start in Rivervale with the Marshal
who is the head of the Leatherfoot Raiders,
because I can't seem to start this quest. He's
the one in the alcove to the right of the
Sheriff. Even if it doesn't start there does
someone know the *exact* words to use to answer
him?

Or is the cap a loot item from the halfling
bandit camp in Nektulos?

mike
